about_the_game:
Whispers Of The Shadow is a story-driven first-person survival horror game.

Story

Upon receiving a tip about Detective Grace Lawson's missing stepsister named Amy, two police officers quickly go to the scene. When Grace received the news, she immediately sets off and when she gets there, she encounters a horrifying sight: The dead body of her police colleague. While she tries to understand what is going on, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

Features

One of the core game mechanics in Whispers Of The Shadow is finding and using candles. Candles are a critical resource that not only illuminates shadows but also acts as a shield against the enemy. In order to illuminate your surroundings and protect yourself against the enemy, you must move forward without getting lost in the darkness by strategically placing and lighting candles.





You have a hand-powered flashlight instead of a classic flashlight. Due to the sound it makes when charging your flashlight, if the enemy is nearby, it will cause the enemy to hear you and come after you. That's why you need to preserve the energy of the flashlight's battery and use and charge it carefully.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
